roleset.name: place in an office formally

example.name: passive
example.text: [Publications receiving a score of 10]-1 will be inducted *-1 into the Indis Hall of Fame.

roleset.note: Frame created by Claire. Frames file for 'induct' based on sentences in ULA written. No Verbnet entry; comparison with 'enroll.'
